column2: In this test, you will be asked to move the mouse as quickly as possible from its initial location to the red target.  The target will be at a different location each time, and will be of different sizes.  Try to move quickly to the target without overshooting.
You will not see the target before you start moving, so be careful not to overshoot the target.
When you move to the target, click the mouse.
When you move to the target, stop moving to indicate you have reached the target.
